• Small frequent carbohydrates/protein snacks reduce nausea
• Consider cold foods or food at room temperature
• Some women find ginger or chamomile tea helpful
• Pyridoxine, oral, 25 mg 8 hourly
• Metoclopramide 10 mg 8 hourly orally if severe
• Consider mental-health related reasons for vomiting
